body.name: Summit PRO247SS 24"" Freestanding Gas Range with 4 Sealed Burners 2.9 cu. ft. Oven Capacity LP Convertible Continuous Grates in Stainless Steel
body.stockDetail: Only 10 left in stock - order soon.
features: Slim 24" width for an easy fit in small kitchens
Continuous cast iron grates offer durability with a unique lightweight design
Four sealed burners with removable cast iron tops ensure safer, cleaner cooking
Door, broiler, and control panel, and handle feature a stainless steel finish for a professional look
Two-piece broiler pan with lid included with each range
body.description: Summit Appliance PRO247SS 24" Wide Gas Range in Stainless Steel with Oven Window, Electronic Ignition, Indicator Lights, Push-to-Turn Controls, Sealed Burners and Continuous Cast Iron Grates The PRO247SS is sized at just 24" wide for an easy fit in smaller kitchen spaces. The front manifold, oven door, and broiler front feature a stainless steel finish, with a black trimmed oven window, handle, and backguard for a modern look. Key Features - Slim 24" width for an easy fit in small kitchens - Continuous cast iron grates offer durability with a unique lightweight design - Four sealed burners with removable cast iron tops ensure safer, cleaner cooking - Door, broiler, and control panel, and handle feature a stainless steel finish for a professional look - Two-piece broiler pan with lid included with each range Specifications - Height of Cabinet: 42" - Width: 23.63" - Depth: 24.5" - Depth with Handle: 25.75" - Depth with door at 90°: 40.25" - Door: Stainless Steel - Cabinet: Black - US Electrical Safety: CSA - Canadian Electrical Safety: CSA-C - Voltage/Frequency: 115V AC/60Hz - Ignition: Spark - LP Convertible: Yes - Oven Capacity: 2.9 cu.ft - Burner Type: Sealed - Number of Burners: 4 - Grate Material: Cast Iron - Burner #1 BTU: 12000 - Burner #2 BTU: 9500 - Burner #3 BTU: 5000 - Burner #4 BTU: 9500 - Burner Controls: Dial - Oven Controls: Dial - Oven Light: Yes - Backguard: Yes - Cleaning Type: Manual - Oven Rack Qty: 2 - Oven Window: Yes - Broiler Location: Below Oven - Weight: 110 lbs. - Shipping Weight: 120 lbs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I had to mark only 4 stars for value for money, because smaller ovens are so expensive. But that is what we needed for my tiny kitchen. The auto burners work great, and I like the different sizes. The oven heats evenly and has enough room for cookie sheets. Probably won't use the broiler because its in the bottom drawer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Stove Unfit for normal use
reviews.reviewText: The oven on this stove is smaller than standard stoves and cannot fit a regular aluminum baking pan. Seller wanted buyer to return item at a cost almost the same price as the item. Do not purchase large appliances on Amazon if you don't know their policy. As a prime member, this transaction is poorly handled. No one wants to accept liability and seller dump their inferior products on suspecting buyer. Lesson :Don't buy a cat in a bag that you can not see. Seller's perception is biased

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 16, 2022
reviews.reviewText: This is a great stove. It was easy to install in our destination trailer. I only had to go to the hardware store for one fitting and that was because my old stove had a different connection than normal. The oven works great and the top burners light perfectly. All in all a great value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 13, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 24 inch gas stove
reviews.reviewText: Stove seems to be pretty good quality, time will tell. Not a full 24 inch standard size measures about 23 and 5/8 burners are nice, cast iron grates. Hooked it up and everything working well. Has an oven light which is nice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Amazon not making a $1000 purchase right! Wrong burner grates!
reviews.reviewText: 0 stars for Amazon!Not making a $1000 purchase right!Stove arrived in good shape but the burner grates are not the correct ones for this model stove!I called Amazon who then had me call the seller who then set up a 3 way call with Amazon to correct the issue. Amazon was to call the manufacturer and work out the details to send me the right parts.I then get an email stating that the burners are the correct part! 🤪Look at the pics! No way these set in this stove and properly support a pot of boiling water! Very upset with this purchase!MAKE IT RIGHT AMAZON!😡🤬😡

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2022
